title: Nuseed U.S. & Canada - Tips for a Smooth Sunflower Harvest (Aug '21)

subtasks: Listen to doc's introduction
Take notes on farming safety tips
Watch doc demonstrate proper equipment operation
Take notes on equipment maintenance

tasks.task: Review notes and identify key safety practices
subtasks: Review notes from video
Highlight important safety procedures
Recall video examples of proper equipment use
Wear appropriate personal protective equipment
Inspect equipment before use
Follow operating procedures
Properly maintain equipment to prevent hazards

tasks.task: Document and share knowledge with fellow workers
subtasks: Take detailed notes during the video
Share safety tips with colleagues at work
Create a checklist of safety practices from the video
Discuss the importance of proper maintenance with coworkers
Report any observed safety violations

tasks.task: - Each of the four MAINTASKs breaks down the broader tasks into specific actions. For example, "Watch video and take notes" expands into listening, taking notes on safety tips, watching equipment operation, and taking notes on maintenance. This level of detail ensures that all aspect of the required physical actions and cognitive processes are accounted for.
